headline: Ford Stock Rallied on Aluminum Shortage. The Pain Has Already Been Felt.
summary: In a year with tariffs, trade wars, and changing electric-vehicle policies,  Ford Motor  investors have another thing to worry about: aluminum.  Monday, The Wall Street Journal reported that Ford was reducing production of five SUV models, following a September fire at a Novelis facility in New York.  Novelis, a large supplier of aluminum sheet to the auto industry, says its plant is expected to be offline until 2026, which leaves auto makers scrambling for alternatives.

Novelis, a large supplier of aluminum sheet to the auto industry, says its plant is expected to be offline until 2026, which leaves auto makers scrambling for alternatives.

headline: Ford cuts production of 5 models after aluminum plant fire: WSJ
summary: Ford (F) is reportedly cutting production of at least five models, according to the Wall Street Journal. This comes after a fire broke out at an aluminum plant, a major supplier for automakers. Yahoo Finance Senior Autos Reporter Pras Subramanian outlines the details on Market Domination. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Stocks to Watch Tuesday: Walmart, J&J, AMD, Oracle
summary: ↗️ Walmart (WMT): Shares of the retailer advanced 5% after it said it is forming a partnership with OpenAI to let shoppers buy its products directly within ChatGPT. ? headline: ECD Automotive Design Announces Satisfaction of Nasdaq Bid Price Condition
summary: KISSIMMEE, Fla., Oct. 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ECD Automotive Design, Inc. (NASDAQ: ECDA), the (“ECD” or the “Company”), the world’s largest Land Rover and Jaguar restoration company known for its custom luxury builds, including bespoke Defenders, Range Rovers, Jaguar E-Types, Ford Mustangs and Toyota FJs, today announced that it received written notice from Nasdaq on October 10, 2025, confirming that the Company regained compliance with the minimum bid price requirement under Nasdaq Listing
